Specimen Type: Fresh tissue sections or formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue blocks
Purpose: To perform the technical component of ZBTB46 immunostaining to produce accurate, reproducible staining for diagnostic interpretation.
Container: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue block or fresh tissue in a sterile container
Equipment: Microtome, 40–45 °C water bath, immunohistochemistry (IHC) staining system
